original_text: Gideon went along a road near the desert. It was east of Nobah and Jogbehah. He attacked the enemy's army by surprise.
korean_text: 적군이 안심하고 있는 중에 기드온이 노바와 욕브하 동쪽 장막에 거주하는 자의 길로 올라가서 그 적진을 치니

sentences.original_text: Gideon went along a road near the desert
It was east of Nobah and Jogbehah
He attacked the enemy's army by surprise
